remarks: Perform induction over the structure of two words of the same length. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2019.)
statement:
wrd2ind.1 $e |- ( ( x = (/) /\ w = (/) ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
wrd2ind.2 $e |- ( ( x = y /\ w = u ) -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
wrd2ind.3 $e |- ( ( x = ( y ++ <" z "> ) /\ w = ( u ++ <" s "> ) ) -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
wrd2ind.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( rh <-> ta ) ) $.
wrd2ind.5 $e |- ( w = B -> ( ph <-> rh ) ) $.
wrd2ind.6 $e |- ps $.
wrd2ind.7 $e |- ( ( ( y e. Word X /\ z e. X ) /\ ( u e. Word Y /\ s e. Y ) /\ ( # ` y ) = ( # ` u ) ) -> ( ch -> th ) ) $.
wrd2ind $p |- ( ( A e. Word X /\ B e. Word Y /\ ( # ` A ) = ( # ` B ) ) -> ta ) $.
$d A w x $.
$d B w x y z $.
$d X s u w x y z $.
$d Y s u w x y z $.
$d ch w x $.
$d ph s u y z $.
$d rh w $.
$d ta x $.
$d th w x $.
